author: jerenkrantz
msg: Improve detection of the INT64_C macro to prevent problems with HP-UX's

author: bnicholes
msg: Fixed up the access paths for building the code generation utilities

author: wrowe
msg: Not certain this patch is strictly necessary, but I recall some abnormal
behavior that was fixed at the time I changed this code.

author: trawick
msg: Make sure gethostbyname() can handle 255.255.255.255.  Otherwise,
we won't trust it to deal with numeric address strings properly
and will use our own logic in apr_sockaddr_info_get().
This fixes an assertion failure at Apache startup when using vhosts
